Subject: Re: Laughing at Striker

From: Yanshosh@...

::Striker::

Striker glances at Spears, his optics emotionless. If they had been 
activated, he would have been hurt by her apeal to Prebon. Erasing his 
memories of her! He would rather die before let that happen.

He was still sure that Prebon wouldn't order her to self-destruct, but if he 
gave in now, he knew that the Maximals would probably never see Spears again. 
At least not as an ally.

He stands where he was, with the same resolution, looking at Prebon.
